SEARCH
Package de.tel_ran.shtentsel_java_telegrambot.service

Class CurrencyService

java.lang.Object
de.tel_ran.shtentsel_java_telegrambot.service.CurrencyService
@Service public class CurrencyService extends Object
Service class for handling currency rate operations. Uses Retrofit to fetch data from an external API and interacts with the repository for currency data management.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CurrencyService()
    Constructor for initializing Retrofit instance and setting up the currency API interface.
    CurrencyService(CurrencyApi currencyApi, CurrencyRepository currencyRepository)
    Constructor for JUnit tests.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrencyRate

      public String getCurrencyRate(String baseCurrency, String requiredCurrency)
      Retrieves the exchange rate between the base currency and the required currency.
      Parameters:
      baseCurrency - the base currency code (e.g., "USD").
      requiredCurrency - the target currency code (e.g., "EUR").
      Returns:
      a formatted string containing the exchange rate details, or an error message if retrieval fails.

    • getCurrencyRates

      public Map<String,CurrencyDto> getCurrencyRates(String baseCurrency)
      Retrieves a map of all currency rates based on the provided base currency.
      Parameters:
      baseCurrency - the base currency code.
      Returns:
      a map containing currency codes as keys and corresponding CurrencyDto as values.

    • isCurrencyExisted

      public boolean isCurrencyExisted(String currency)
      Checks if the provided currency code exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      currency - the currency code to check.
      Returns:
      true if the currency exists, false otherwise.
